KENT STATE UNIVERSITY
KENT, OHIO
December 2, 1957
Mr, Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager, NAEB
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Underwood;
The proposal of November 18 looks good and is satisÂ¬
factory from our standpoint.
If this is acceptable on the part of ETRC, when do
you think we can start to function under it?
We are ready.
Sincerely yours.
Ralph H. Hall
Audio Visual Center
